title: China Urban Sky-High Break within Tianjin
description: Overlooking the Hai River, InterContinental Tianjin Yujiapu Hotel & Residences, an IHG Hotel, is a lavish home away from home in the heart of the Yujiapu financial district. Work up a sweat in the fitness centre, refresh yourself with a dip in the indoor pool or experience authentic Tianjin at local markets and temples. As the evening approaches, savour sumptuous local delicacies in a high-end atmosphere at Cai Feng Lou restaurant.
location_description: InterContinental Tianjin Yujiapu Hotel & Residences, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 3360, Xinhua Road, Binhai New Area, Tianjin 300465 China

title: China Castle-Style Tianjin Escape with Upscale Japanese Restaurant
description: There's something for every traveller in the charming castle-style Crowne Plaza Tianjin Jinnan, an IHG Hotel. For the little ones, there's a kids' swimming pool and an indoor-outdoor playground. For adults, a billiards room, top-notch fitness centre and simply huge indoor swimming pool will keep you entertained. When it comes to wining and dining, the onsite Japanese restaurant serves up delicious teppanyaki and freshly prepared sushi, while the bar is the go-to spot for a cocktail.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tianjin Jinnan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Lingyu Road Balitai Area, Jinnan District, Tianjin 300350, China

title: China Tianjin Binhai Lakefront Retreat with Pampering Day Spa
description: Discover a pocket of tranquility amid Tianjin's cityscape when you stay lakeside at Crowne Plaza Tianjin Binha, an IHG Hotel. For an extra dose of relaxation, head to the first floor where the spa offers traditional healing treatments and pampering massages to rejuvenate body and soul. When it comes to food, there's no need to travel far for an incredible feast. Indulge with the finest Japanese tepanyaki and extensive sake menu, or opt for variety with upscale dim sum dining.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tianjin Binhai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.55 Zhongxin Avenue Airport Industrial Park, Tianjin, 300308, Mainland China

title: China Lakefront Urban Escape with Four Exceptional Restaurants
description: Discover the ancient city of Tianjin Binhai when you stay at Crowne Plaza Tianjin Meijiangnan, a modern city break on the shores of a beautiful lake. During your stay, take a dip in the indoor swimming pool, work out at the fitness centre or enjoy a breath of fresh air with a lakeside stroll. Hungry? There are four restaurants to choose from: opt for mouthwatering Cantonese, authentic Italian dishes, snacks and cocktails, or a seafood buffet with a front-row seat to lakefront panoramas.
offer_address: East to South Youyi Road, Hexi District Opposite Tianjin Meijiang Conference and Exhibition Center, Tianjin 300221, China
